caption: A data-driven generative model that can synthesize new virtual bedrooms and other types of 3D indoor scenes.
Reconstructing time-varying 4D objects with unsupervised segmentation.
A neural network to 'reverse engineer' CAD modeling sequences for 3D shapes.
A system for creating new 3D floor plans by automatically recombining rooms from existing floor plans.
A neural network to transmogrify images of animals without altering the image background.
A neural network to write programs that generate structured 3D shapes, such as chairs.
High-resolution text-to-shape synthesis without any text labels at training time.
A neural network to insert images of objects into new environments.
A neural generative model that can learn to write in your handwriting and represent all kinds of different styles.
Building high-quality models of objects from only a few images.
